title: Data Analyst
description: <strong><u>About JSSI</u></strong><p><br></p>For more than 30 years, Jet Support Services, Inc. (JSSI), has been the leading independent provider of maintenance support and financial services to the business aviation industry. JSSI is responsible for maintaining in excess of 2,000 business jets, regional jets, and helicopters across the globe and serves customers through an infrastructure of certified technical advisors and providing maintenance tracking software (Traxxall and SierraTrax). JSSI leverages this technical knowledge, experience, buying power, and data to provide support at every stage of the aircraft life cycle; from aircraft acquisition to aircraft teardown and part out.<p><br></p>For more information, visit jetsupport.com .<p><br></p><strong><u>About The Role</u></strong><p><br></p>JSSI Parts &amp; Leasing (JPL) is hiring a Data Analyst to work in the Data Analytics department.<p><br></p>The Data Analytics department is responsible for collecting, researching, and analyzing internal and external data to provide the company with key metrics on performance, demand forecasts from the part level to the whole aircraft, as well as analytical tools that support business decisions. The Data Analyst will develop new data products and methodologies, while maintaining existing ones. Candidates should have strong analytical abilities and experience developing data-driven metrics. Working knowledge of the aviation industry is an advantage.<p><br></p><em>The Data Analyst will report to the Data Analytics Manager and will work in the Chicago headquarters or remotely.</em><p><br></p><strong><u>Duties And Responsibilities</u></strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Develop, own, and maintain recurrent reporting activities</li><li>Establish forecasts to guide the team in future part or asset acquisitions</li><li>Define and track key metrics to monitor and improve performance</li><li>Develop and maintain sample reports to help the team make business decisions</li><li>Support the Data Analytics Manager in various strategic projects leveraging JPL data insights</li><li>Maintain our system up to date through scheduled and “as-needed” updates</li><li>Suggest ways to improve current analytics methods and reports</li><li>Stay up to date on methods and tools through training</li><li>Provide ideas for continuous improvement</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Desired Credentials</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or other related degree</li><li>2-3 years of experience as a Data Analyst, Data Scientist AND/OR Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or other related degree.</li><li>Business related minor is a plus</li><li>Needs to have an interest in the Aviation Industry</li><li>Knowledge of Excel’s advanced functionalities is required</li><li>Computer coding experience (SQL/SOQL preferred, R/Python are a plus)</li><li>Dashboard development experience (Power BI/Tableau)</li><li>Machine Learning experience is a plus</li><li>Experience with Salesforce is a plus</li><li>Ability to learn fast and adapt to new situations</li><li>Highly organized and able to thrive in a demanding environment</li><li>Ability to communicate findings clearly and concisely</li></ul><p><br></p><em>JSSI is an Equal Opportunity / Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or other characteristic protected by law.</em>

reporting.</li></ul></ul><p><br></p><strong>What You Will Bring</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Bachelor’s or master’s degree in a relevant field such as data science, statistics, mathematics, or computer science.</li><li>Proven experience (3+ years) working as a Data Analyst or in a similar role.</li><li>Strong proficiency in SQL for data extraction, manipulation, and analysis.</li><li>Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or Excel.</li><li>Proficient in data cleansing, preprocessing, and validation techniques.</li><li>Familiarity with statistical analysis, data mining, and data modeling concepts.</li><li>Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.</li><li>Excellent communication and presentation skills to convey complex data findings.</li><li>Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects and priorities.</li><li>Knowledge of programming languages such as Python or R is a plus.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>What You Can Expect</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Variety of workplace arrangements including hybrid, remote, onsite. </li><li>Compensation commensurate with employee qualifications, experience, and other factors including geographic location, market, and operational factors.</li><li>Pay Range: $60+/hour</li><li>Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision, Life insurance, Disability insurance, 401(k) savings You will be responsible for analyzing business processes, identifying areas for improvement, and designing solutions that align with the organization's goals and technology resources. Monitor project progress, identify risks, and propose mitigation strategies.</li><li> Testing and Quality Assurance: Collaborate with QA teams to define test scenarios, review test plans, and participate in testing activities to ensure solutions meet business requirements.</li><li> Change Management: Support change initiatives by analyzing impacts, preparing training materials, and assisting in user adoption and acceptance.</li><li> Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation, including requirements specifications, user manuals, and process diagrams.</li><li> Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in business analysis, sharing knowledge and promoting continuous improvement within the organization.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong><u>Qualifications</u></strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business Administration, or equivalent experience. Relevant certifications (e.g., CBAP, CCBA) are a plus.</li><li> Experience: Previous experience in business analysis, preferably in the IT field, or Freight Forwarding. Familiarity with software development lifecycle (SDLC) methodologies and project management frameworks.</li><li> Analytical Skills: Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving abilities, with the capacity to evaluate complex business processes and identify areas for improvement.</li><li> Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with diverse stakeholders and translate technical concepts to non-technical users.</li><li> Requirements Elicitation: Proven experience in gathering and documenting business and system requirements using various techniques (e.g., interviews, workshops, use cases).</li><li> Technical Knowledge: Familiarity with IT systems, databases, and software development concepts. Understanding of programming languages, database structures, and data modeling is beneficial.</li><li> Attention to Detail: Meticulous approach to documentation and analysis, ensuring accuracy and completeness in all deliverables.</li><li> Adaptability: Ability to work in a dynamic environment, handling multiple projects simultaneously and quickly adapting to changing priorities and deadlines.</li><li> Problem Solving: Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills, with the ability to identify root causes, propose effective solutions, and make data-driven decisions.</li><li> Team Player: Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams, fostering a positive and inclusive work environment.</li><li> Good time management</li></ul>

This role will frequently collaborate with business partners, data scientists and ML engineers. This role will design and enable key subsystems of the Data Platform, optimize operational critical metrics, and establish processes and best practices. As part of the platform team, this role will work in innovative cloud technologies from AWS and other ecosystems, including but not limited to Airflow, OpenTelemetry, OpenLineage, Marquez, Great Expectations, and others.<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li>Partner with development teams and other department leaders/stakeholders to provide innovative technical solutions that enable business capabilities.</li><li>Participate and lead in design and development of innovative batch and streaming data applications using AWS technologies. Support large scale data pipelines in a distributed and scalable environment.
